item.title: An Addendum to Plouffe's Ramanujan Identities
item.description: arXiv:2507.00040v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We introduce a new class of polylogarithm sums closely related to a family studied by L. Vep\v{s}tas in 2010. These generalized sums depend on two free parameters and yield closed-form expressions involving the Dirichlet eta function. Additionally, we present an alternative proof for a hyperbolic sum originally discussed by Ramanujan.
item.dc:creator: Segun Olofin Akerele
